compilation_geometry_receipt_ids.semantics: Receipts documenting geometry operations used during PCT trailblazer compilation

consensus_receipt_ids.semantics: IDs of consensus receipts (e.g., BFTConsensusReceipt) associated with workflow-level consensus events

determinism_tier.semantics: Determinism tier at which this workflow is intended to run

environment_contract_id.semantics: Reference to the environment_contract used when compiling and deploying this workflow

geometry_control_profile_ids.semantics: Optional list of geometry profile IDs and/or control ruleset IDs relevant to this workflow's execution

monitoring_specification_id.semantics: Reference to a monitoring_specification described in enhanced_pct_method_overview_v2 or AGUA integration

runtime_binding_spec_id.semantics: Identifier of a runtime binding specification describing concrete tools, agents, and resources for this workflow

safety_policy_refs.semantics: References to safety policies (including geometry-based guardrails) that must be enforced at runtime

tui_geometry_mode_binding.semantics: Optional binding that indicates which TUI geometry mode should be activated when this workflow executes (e.g., hyperbolic vs spherical vs mixed views)

validation_geometry_receipt_ids.semantics: Receipts documenting geometry-based validation and guardrail checks

workflow_id.semantics: Unique identifier for this canonized workflow

metadata.description: Schema for production-ready PCT workflows with runtime bindings
metadata.title: Enhanced PCT Canonized Workflow Schema v2
